content: I thought I saw some fresh footprints in the grass. {A笑眯眯}Turns out it's a new friend. I'm happy to be picking—I mean, stepping, on the grass with you.
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-客机联机-初次见面-12绵朵_联机对话（CB1）

content: ...Meh? Oh right, I'm Medowlyn, a plushie designer. You must be <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, right? Welcome to our little corner.
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-客机联机-初次见面-12绵朵_联机对话（CB1）
